product_name: SmartWool PHD Smartloft Skirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A fun to-and-fro layer for your lower half, the women's SmartWool PHD SmartLoft Skirt keeps your backside warm on the way to the rocks. It's also sturdy enough to go with snowshoes.
short_description: A fun to-and-fro layer for your lower half, the women's SmartWool PHD SmartLoft Skirt keeps your backside warm on the way to the rocks. It's also sturdy enough to go with snowshoes.
